name: Island Development Company (Aviation)
about: The Aviation Department of the Islands Development Company, based at Pointe Larue near Seychelles International Airport, is dedicated to providing comprehensive aviation services. Our primary objective is to ensure the transportation of IDC workers, visitors, and investors to and from the various islands managed by the company, facilitating supply, service, and economic development while supporting conservation efforts. We operate a fleet of aircraft, including the Beechcraft B-1900 and the Y-12, offering chartered flights to meet the diverse needs of our clients. With a focus on reliability and safety, our aviation services are integral to connecting and servicing the islands, contributing to their overall development and sustainability.
